name: Maniac Minions
description:
Your task is to obey the orders from the professor. You have to bring the objects he requires which you'll get by destroying the machines on the playground.

But there's one problem: you have to fight with your crewmate against the other team to get the objects. Be prepared for your enemies attacks and try to be faster!

TEAM

Katarina Mitrovic  Art - Animation- Game Design

Paul Schulz  Art- Effects

Natalia Scigulla Konzeptart - Programing

Nikolas Klein  Programing - Game Design/System Design

Annika Schwab  Art - Environment - Game Design

CREDITS

This game was created at the Game Design // UE Department of the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervisor: Prof. Sebastian Stamm
